bill_title: allow for the redistribution of unused nursing facility bed capacity.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to allow for the redistribution of unused nursing facility bed capacity. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That the code be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: A nursing facility may use any of the nursing facility's unused bed capacity before July 1, 2018. After June 30, 2018, any unused bed capacity shall revert to the Department of Health and be retained in the unlicensed moratorium bed population for the future needs of the state. Section 2. That the code be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: Before July 1, 2023, a nursing facility may submit a proposal to use all or a portion of the unused bed capacity previously held by the nursing facility. The Department of Health shall utilize the process and criteria established in §§ 34-12-35.6 to 34-12-35.9, inclusive, to determine the need for the additional nursing facility beds. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.161 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
